name: TANGI
description:
Introduction:

TANGI is the result of a cloning experiment with the hypothesis, "Given that tetrominoes and tangram pieces can fit into their own rectangle, the classic action puzzle formula will remain functional even when the former is swapped with the latter." 

Game Features:

-Three different game games:

      + Rest: Pieces move only when you move them.

      +Sprint: Clear 10 rows as quickly as possible.

      +Marathon: Clear 50 rows with the pieces falling faster every 5 rows.

-Rebindable keyboard keys

      + Controllers are not supported.

- Records highscore rows and time when playing "Sprint" or "Marathon" modes.

      + Highscore data is lost when the game application closes.

Pronunciation:

"tan-gee"
